Articles.Content:
Minecraft, in SPAAAAAAAAAAAACEEEE!!!!!

You start out with a small number of blocks to make a ship, you start by mining asteroids and selling the blocks, once you become powerfull enough you can start fighting pirates and salvaging the wrecks, and you can build giant ships, mine ore from planets, have wars in multiplayer, the universe is the limit!
Ooh... Sounds a bit (kinda (sorta (maybe a little bit like))) Space Engineers to me, but send a link for later! I wanna check this out.
It's fun, but in like the more complex space engineers. Starmade is fun though for a free game.
Pretty fun game...but I'm spoiled with Eve Online when it comes to complexity. Played Starmade for a while, but Rust now sucked me in. Brilliant sandbox game if you find a good server.
